movies.Title: Spirited Away
movies.Actors: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Susan Egan, David Ogden Stiers
movies.Plot: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.

movies.Title: The Intouchables
movies.Actors: Fran√ßois Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
movies.Plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caretaker.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 25 wins & 31 nominations.

movies.Title: Memento
movies.Writer: Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Jonathan Nolan (short story "Memento Mori")
movies.Actors: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior
movies.Plot: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 47 wins & 34 nominations.

movies.Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.Actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick
movies.Plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.
